rukus.text: Wa 'Idh Qala 'Ibrahimu Rabbi Aj`al Hadha Al-Balada 'Aminaan Wa Ajnubni Wa Baniya 'An Na`buda Al-'Asnama
Rabbi 'Innahunna 'Ađlalna Kathiraan Mina An-Nasi Faman Tabi`ani Fa'innahu Minni Wa Man `Asani Fa'innaka Ghafurun Rahimun

Rabbana 'Inni 'Askantu Min Dhurriyati Biwadin Ghayri Dhi Zar`in `Inda Baytika Al-Muharrami Rabbana Liyuqimu As-Salaata Faj`al 'Af'idatan Mina An-Nasi Tahwi 'Ilayhim Wa Arzuqhum Mina Ath-Thamarati La`allahum Yashkuruna
Rabbana 'Innaka Ta`lamu Ma Nukhfi Wa Ma Nu`linu Wa Ma Yakhfa `Ala Allahi Min Shay'in Fi Al-'Arđi Wa La Fi As-Sama'i
Al-Hamdu Lillahi Al-Ladhi Wahaba Li `Ala Al-Kibari 'Isma`ila Wa 'Ishaqa 'Inna Rabbi Lasami`u Ad-Du`a'i
Rabbi Aj`alni Muqima As-Salaati Wa Min Dhurriyati Rabbana Wa Taqabbal Du`a'i
Rabbana Aghfir Li Wa Liwalidayya Wa Lilmu'uminina Yawma Yaqumu Al-Hisabu
